alert.note: Alert for Eastern Kiowa County; Lamar Vicinity, Prowers County; Las Animas Vicinity, Bent County; Western Kiowa County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 12 at 5:43PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Prowers, eastern Kiowa and northeastern Bent Counties through 630 PM MDT... At 543 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Hasty, or 18 miles west of Lamar, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... McClave around 550 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Neegronda Reservoir, Sweetwater Reservoir, Queens Reservoir and Neeoshe Reservoir. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Kiowa County; Lamar Vicinity, Prowers County; Las Animas Vicinity, Bent County; Western Kiowa County
